channel.title: Conversation with NPC's?
channel.description: There's probably a tutorial out there, but I can't find one. If you do find one just post the link. Iv'e tried a lot of different things, but none seem to work. Does anyone know how I can have a conversation with an NPC? I'd really appreciate it if you just gave me the backround of it. What files I'm going to have to edit, where to start, etc. Thanks.

item.title: Conversation with NPC's?
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Skill09 Mod Skill09
item.description:
@Mod_Skill09 wrote:

W00t, Second post? You can have conversations by adding NPC Dialogues, in client.java

Read full topic
